permissions: Admins can list all time card time changes; non-admins can list time card time changes for time cards they are allowed to see via TimeCardPolicy scope.
validation_notes: Filters accept comma-separated IDs for --time-card, --created-by, and --broker. --is-processed expects a strict boolean (true/false).

flags.name: --time-card
flags.description: Filter by time card ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --created-by
flags.description: Filter by created by user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --is-processed
flags.validation: Must be a strict boolean: true or false.

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)
